title.defaultValue: {{((sourceData, formData, fieldState) => ( formData.githubLink ? GithubManager.getGithubIssues().find(item => item.value === formData.githubLink).label : sourceData.title))(Issue_Form.sourceData, Issue_Form.formData, Issue_Form.fieldState)}}
title.label: Title

children.text: Merge this issue into existing issue
Please be careful about this, this is an irreversible action
Be careful, this action will delete the issue as all it's upvotes
